org.vast.sensorML

Class ExecutableChainImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vast.sensorML.ExecutableProcessImpl
      • org.vast.sensorML.ExecutableChainImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, IProcessChainExec, IProcessExec

    public class ExecutableChainImpl
extends ExecutableProcessImpl
implements IProcessChainExec

    Implementation of an executable process chain.
    This class can be associated with an AggregateProcess to provide execution capability, but this will only work if all components of the aggregate also have an executable implementation associated to them.

    Since:
    Feb 28, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws SMLException
        Description copied from interface: IProcessExec
